title: Smart Data Models - DiscExcContIEEEDEC2A
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Type DEC2A model for the discontinuous excitation control. This system provides transient excitation boosting via an open-loop control as initiated by a trigger signal generated remotely.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 12.3.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be DiscExcContIEEEDEC2A

td1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Discontinuous controller time constant (). Default: 0

td2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Discontinuous controller washout time constant (). Default: 0

vk.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Discontinuous controller input reference (). Default: 0.0
